sentences.en: A cultivated plant of an unaltered wild species.
But previous attempts transplant unaltered pig tissue into humans have failed, due to immune rejection tissue.
sentences.cn: 但是, 由于种间组织免疫系统之相互排异反应,从前那些用未经改良之猪器官做之移植试验都失败了.

sentences.en: Examinations of several thousand thin sections revealed a few examples of unaltered ferromagnesian and sulfide minerals.
sentences.cn: 经过对数千薄片的研究发现了少数未变化的铁镁和硫化物矿的实例.

sentences.en: If these shadows remain unaltered, I believe the child will die.
sentences.cn: 如果这些阴影一直没变的话我相信这个孩子要死了.

sentences.en: In the high impedance state, output voltage is unaltered.
sentences.cn: 在高阻抗状态, 输出电压不改变.

sentences.en: No mood can be maintained quite unaltered through.
sentences.cn: 人的心情总是在不断变化.

sentences.en: The continuity of life and wisdom has remained unaltered in this family for years.
sentences.cn: 生活和智慧的延续在这个家庭里保持多年未变.

sentences.en: The integrity of the data refers to the unaltered state of the data.
sentences.cn: 数据的完整性是指数据的状态不被改变.

sentences.en: The rest of the apartment had fortunately remained unaltered since that time.
sentences.cn: 从那时起公寓的其余部分就幸运地未曾改变过。

sentences.en: The ultrasound findings remained unaltered until the last scan at 34 weeks.
sentences.cn: 直到孕34周做最后一次检查之前,下面这种超声表现都保持不变.

sentences.en: The undesirable trend towards a rapid rise in consumption, evident in previous years, remained unaltered.
sentences.cn: 消费极速上涨的不正常趋势, 过去几年很明显, 仍保持不变.

sentences.en: With the temperature unaltered, the air is did to reach condensation by adding runing water.
sentences.cn: 在温度不变时, 经过加入水汽而使空气达到饱和.

words.tran_cn: 不能改变的；坚定不移的
不可改变地，坚定不移地
不变的；未被改变的；照旧的

trans.tran_cn: <书>未改变的，未被改变的，（动物）未阉割的
trans.tran_en: Something that remains unaltered has not changed or been changed
